DOC.brief_summary: This Study compare two ZD4054 ( Zibotentan ) dose ( 10mg 30mg ) placebo positive control look ZD4054 ( Zibotentan ) 's effect ECG Healthy Volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Four-period Crossover Study Assess Effects Single Oral Doses ZD4054 ( Zibotentan ) ( 10mg 30mg ) QTc Interval
DOC.criteria: Non Smoker Normal rest 12lead ECG normal QTc interval ( < 450 msec ) Negative screen serum hepatitis B surface antigen , hepatitis C antibody Human Immunodeficiency Virus ( HIV ) screen Receipt another new chemical entity 4 month dose study ; participation another study participation noninvasive methodology study drug give within 30 day dose study Risk ( investigator 's opinion ) transmitting , blood body fluid , agent responsible acquire immune deficiency syndrome ( AIDS ) , hepatitis B hepatitis C Judgement investigator , healthy volunteer participate study
